text: Ma waxay haddaba sugi waxaan ahayn inay u timaaddo malaaâ€™igtu, ama Rabbigaa yimaado, ama qaar ka mid ah calaamooyinka Rabbigaa yimaadaan. Maalinta ay qaar ka mid ah Calaamooyinka Rabbigaa yimaadaan, wax uma taro naf iimaankeedu iyadoo aan horay u rumeyn, ama aan ku kasban iimaankeeda khayr. Dheh: Suga idinku, innaguna (sidoo kale) waan sugaynaa
